attributes.action: require Andy Burnham (MP) to apologise for discussing X Factor in the Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The secretary for culture recently described an X Factor contestant as "wonderful and talented" during a Commons question time session.

The admission by a senior Number 10 figure that this country's government gives the slightest consideration to a talent show is disgusting. It was also completely irrelevant to the matter being discussed. That he should think to waste the time of the Commons with such an irrelevance, leads me to demand that he apologise for his remarks. The country is facing enough problems without the honorable gentleman trying to reclassify the X Factor as "culture".

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
